Simply playing with basic geometric shapes car. provide o y>x 
if graphic solutions. Even so, it is only by adding extra effects 
jSiMrs can exploit the full range of possibilities. Anvyu; ,y ; ..v 


:hniques currently used in logo design are mirror mu. ,, m 


2 


, , 




n and cropping. In the main, a finished logo design^^^^l 
?sult of a single set of specifications. The most exciting r.r 
ncratic logos rely simultaneously on several effects, a it: 

*q recent work reveals that, whatever the new and cons tar i 
id# may be, designers are still happy to fall back on 

described on the following pages. 















eintachen geometrischen Grundformen 
ibt unterschiedlicher grafischer Losungen. 
q weiterer Effekte lasst sich jedoch die 
chkeiten aussehopfen. Ein Foku;> ui. 
'erdooplur.g oder Zerschneiden verdec 
Gestaltung von Logos. Oft fand in dr 

• ■ etner Gestaltungsparameta

AJ) 















































rlt 



















































































lit 



























































































The Modernist logos featured in this book were in the nr.ae 
□tec over a period of about 40 years by graphic designers of va yi: 
ages and nationalities. Looking at the logos in this book if could 
easily be assumed that none of the designers has an unmistakc r 
style. However, when we explore the work of eight ground break' 
logo designers from different parts of the world and radically a if;. ■ 
backgrounds, the opposite seems to be true. Furthermore, this seler 
: ion of 'works arranged in chronological order also shows now tho on 
of the logo has continued to advance in this Modernist age. 


Die meisten der in diesem Buch versammelten modernistischen 
Logos wurden in einen Zeitraum von etwa 40 Jahren von Gestastom 
unterschiedlichen Alters und verschiedener Herkunft entwoifen. 
Betrachtet man die Logos in der in diesem Buch vorliegenden Kate- 
gorisierung, entsteht leicht der Eindruck, so etwas wie die individual; 
Handschrift eines Gestalters existiere bei diesem Medium gar mcht. 
)er Blick auf die Arbeiten von acht wegweisenden Logogestuuf > 

3 verschiedenen Teilen der Erde stammen und grundverschie
